entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is gasping for breath. She is trying to explain something to Umbridge, but is interrupted by her harsh tone.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a professor who is described as having 'stubby hands' and speaking in a harsh tone. She is trying to get Hermione to show her something, but Hermione is resistant.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who told Hermione and others what to do. He is not physically present in the scene.

relationships.description: Hermione and Umbridge are interacting with each other, with Hermione trying to explain something to Umbridge, but being interrupted by her harsh tone.
Hermione received instructions from Professor Dumbledore on what to do, which she is now trying to explain to Umbridge.
